code: import axios from"axios";import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{NavLink}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Top10Series=()=>{const[data,setData]=useState([]);const[scrollPosition,setScrollPosition]=useState(0);useEffect(()=>{axios.get("https://api.themoviedb.org/3/tv/top_rated?api_key=864b6602f4018630491e67fa714381e6&language=fr-FR").then(res=>setData(res.data.results));},[]);const handleScroll=direction=>{const container=document.getElementById("movieContainer");const scrollAmount=200;if(direction==="left"){container.scrollLeft-=scrollAmount;setScrollPosition(container.scrollLeft);}else{container.scrollLeft+=scrollAmount;setScrollPosition(container.scrollLeft);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"top10",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"movieContainer",id:"movieContainer",children:data.slice(0,10).map((movie,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{to:"/SeriesPopulaires/".concat(movie.id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card-top10",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"img",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/original"+movie.poster_path,alt:""}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:index+1})]})})}))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"prev",onClick:()=>handleScroll("left"),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fa-solid fa-angle-left"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"next",onClick:()=>handleScroll("right"),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fa-solid fa-angle-right"})})]});};export default Top10Series;
